q: ... It just[ felt] negative." The "Just Go With It' star was referring to past seasons that included the outspoken Simon Cowell at the judges' table. Oprah Winfrey defended him, saying, I'm a Simon Cowell fan and what I thought is that Simon Cowell had a way of speaking the truth that was saying what you wanted to say but you wouldn't actually say it. She added, "I will say that it"s a kinder, gentler[ show now.]"

and Jennifer Lopez replacing Ellen DeGeneres and Simon Cowell on the hit show, and the two superstars wowed contestants and TV critics with their enthusiastic response to wannabes at auditions in New Jersey, which were taped last year. Not only are they great to look at, Jennifer Lopez and Steven Tyler are long-time stars who have nothing to gain, or lose, by being part of American Idol. She adds, "Their natural confidence in front of the camera was such a blessed relief that it was hard to miss even the bracing ballistics of Simon Cowell ." Comment on this Article New York

said David Letterman . "Being pummeled?" Anderson Cooper said. "I don't recommend it. I'd never been hit in the head before." He described the scene, saying, People came from all around, surrounding us, punching us, kicking us, trying to rip the clothes off my female producer. It was weird. And we were lucky, frankly.... I would start to slap back and then realize this is going to make it worse. My adrenline was pumping so much. I've never really been in a fight like this or attacked by a mob like this. I thought I was saying calm down, as if they could understand what I was saying. from the Chris Christie 's Mansion "Given what I also considered the long odds against Mike Pence winning the presidential contest, I think he has made the right call," National Review's Rick Santorum Hood counters. As Daniels, Chris Christie , and others are in the midst of demonstrating, the post of governor is an excellent place to showcase the promise and importance of conservative governance-- and to hone the leadership and management skills that future chief executives need to be effective. Player for nearly 20 minutes, using his quickness to prevent Allen Iverson from even getting the ball, let alone shoot it. He had spent the last two practices impersonating Allen Iverson and apparently got pretty good at it. I just try to deny him the ball as much as possible, because when he does get the ball, the best penetrator in the game is going to be hard to stop, Tyronn Lue said.
